Topic: Chinese Music: Traditional Performance Practice. A performance-based course, with a focus on the traditional music of South China.
Issues such as traditional temperament, variation techniques and heterophonic interaction will be examined through readings, discussion and performance. Open to students with prior performance experience and permission of instructor [alan.thrasher@ubc.ca].
courseName: Selected Topics in Music - CHIN PERF PRACT
description: See School of Music schedule for description and prerequisites. Restricted to B. Mus. and B.A. in Music students.
